name: Entei
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Basic Energy cards attached to Entei or this attack does nothing.

name: Pidgeot
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Pidgeot is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Raikou
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Raikou does 20 damage to itself.

name: Suicune
Ability1Text: If Suicune is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent's attack (even if Suicune is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros.

name: Venusaur
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Venusaur can't use Hard Plant during your next turn.

name: Ivysaur
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Multi Technical Machine 01
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cacnea
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: If there are 2 Defending Pokémon in play, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (If there is only 1 Defending Pokémon, this attack does nothing.)
Attack2Text: Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to the other Defending Pokémon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Defending Pokémon.)

name: Phanpy
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Pikachu
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

name: Celebi ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Celebi ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for a card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
Attack1Text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Celebi ex by your opponent's Pokémon-ex during your opponent's next turn.
